   20: 
   21: -module(tftp_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   26: %% Includes and defines
   27: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include("tftp_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: -define(START_DAEMON(Port, Options),
   33:         begin
   34:             {ok, Pid} = ?VERIFY({ok, _Pid}, tftp:start([{port, Port} | Options])),
   35:             if
   36:                 Port == 0 ->
   37:                     {ok, ActualOptions} = ?IGNORE(tftp:info(Pid)),
   38:                     {value, {port, ActualPort}} =
   39:                         lists:keysearch(port, 1, ActualOptions),
   40:                     {ActualPort, Pid};
   41:                 true ->
   42:                     {Port, Pid}
   43:             end
   44:         end).
   45: 
   46: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   47: %% API
   48: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   49: 
   50: t() -> 
   51:     tftp_test_lib:t([{?MODULE, all}]).
   52: 
   53: t(Cases) ->
   54:     tftp_test_lib:t(Cases, default_config()).
   55: 
   56: t(Cases, Config) ->
   57:     tftp_test_lib:t(Cases, Config).
   58: 
   59: default_config() ->
   60:     [].
   61: 
   62: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   63: %% Test server callbacks
   64: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   65: 
   66: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   67:     tftp_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   68: 
   69: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   70:     tftp_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   71: 
   72: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   73: %% Top test case
   74: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   75: 
   76: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   77: 
   78: all() ->
   79:     [
   80:      simple,
   81:      extra,
   82:      reuse_connection,
   83:      resend_client,
   84:      resend_server,
   85:      large_file,
   86:      app,
   87:      appup,
   88:      start_tftpd
   89:     ].
   90: 
   91: groups() -> 
   92:     [].
   93: 
   94: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   95:     Config.
   96: 
   97: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  101:     Config.
  102: 
  103: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  104:     Config.
  105: 
  106: 
  107: app() ->
  108:     [{doc, "Test that the tftp app file is ok"}].
  109: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     ok = test_server:app_test(tftp).
  111: 
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: appup() ->
  114:     [{doc, "Test that the tftp appup file is ok"}].
  115: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     ok = test_server:appup_test(tftp).
  117: 
  118: start_tftpd() ->
  119:     [{doc, "Start/stop of tfpd service"}].
  120: start_tftpd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  122:     ok = tftp:start(),
  123:     {ok, Pid0} = tftp:start_service([{host, "localhost"}, {port, 0}]),
  124:     Pids0 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- tftp:services()],
  125:     true = lists:member(Pid0, Pids0),
  126:     {ok, [_|_]} = tftp:service_info(Pid0),
  127:     tftp:stop_service(Pid0),
  128:     ct:sleep(100),
  129:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- tftp:services()],
  130:     false = lists:member(Pid0, Pids1),
  131: 
  132:     {ok, Pid1} =
  133: 	tftp:start_standalone([{host, "localhost"}, {port, 0}]),
  134:     Pids2 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- tftp:services()],
  135:     false = lists:member(Pid1, Pids2),
  136:     %% Standalone service is not supervised
  137:     {error,not_found} = tftp:stop_service(Pid1),
  138:     ok = tftp:stop(),
  139: 
  140:     application:load(tftp),
  141:     application:set_env(tftp, services, [{tftpd, [{host, "localhost"},
  142:                                                   {port, 0}]}]),
  143:     ok = tftp:start(),
  144:     1 = length(tftp:services()),
  145:     application:unset_env(tftp, services),
  146:     ok = tftp:stop().
  147: 
  148: 
  149: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  150: %% Simple
  151: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  152: 
  153: simple(doc) ->
  154:     ["Start the daemon and perform simple a read and write."];
  155: simple(suite) ->
  156:     [];
  157: simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(tftp)),
  159: 
  160:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  161: 
  162:     %% Read fail
  163:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_temporary_remote_test_file.txt",
  164:     LocalFilename = "tftp_temporary_local_test_file.txt",
  165:     Blob = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(2000, $1)),
  166:     %% Blob = <<"Some file contents\n">>,
  167:     Size = size(Blob),
  168:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  169:     ?VERIFY({error, {client_open, enoent, _}},
  170:             tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, [{port, Port}])),
  171:     
  172:     %% Write and read
  173:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob, [{port, Port}])),
  174:     ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, [{port, Port}])),
  175:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  176:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  177: 
  178:     %% Cleanup
  179:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  180:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  181:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  182:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  183:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(tftp)),
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  187: %% Extra
  188: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  189: 
  190: extra(doc) ->
  191:     ["Verify new stuff for IS 1.2."];
  192: extra(suite) ->
  193:     [];
  194: extra(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  195:     ?VERIFY({'EXIT', {badarg,{fake_key, fake_flag}}},
  196:             tftp:start([{port, 0}, {fake_key, fake_flag}])),
  197: 
  198:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  199:     
  200:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_extra_temporary_remote_test_file.txt",
  201:     LocalFilename = "tftp_extra_temporary_local_test_file.txt",
  202:     Blob = <<"Some file contents\n">>,
  203:     Size = size(Blob),
  204:     Host = "127.0.0.1",
  205:     Peer = {inet, Host, Port},
  206:     Generic =
  207:         [
  208:          {state,   []},
  209:          {prepare, fun extra_prepare/6},
  210:          {open,    fun extra_open/6},
  211:          {read,    fun extra_read/1},
  212:          {write,   fun extra_write/2},
  213:          {abort,   fun extra_abort/3 }
  214:         ],
  215:     Options = [{host, Host},
  216:                {port, Port},
  217:                %%{ debug,all},
  218:                {callback, {".*", tftp_test_lib, Generic}}],
  219:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(LocalFilename, Blob)),
  220:     ?VERIFY({ok, [{count, Size}, Peer]},
  221:             tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, Options)),
  222:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  223:     
  224:     ?VERIFY({ok,[{bin, Blob}, Peer]}, 
  225:             tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, Options)),
  226: 
  227:     %% Cleanup
  228:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  229:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  230:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  231:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: -record(extra_state,  {file, blksize, count, acc, peer}).
  235: 
  236: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  237: %% Prepare
  238: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  239: 
  240: extra_prepare(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) ->
  241:     %% Client side
  242:     BlkSize = list_to_integer(tftp_test_lib:lookup_option("blksize", "512", SuggestedOptions)),
  243:     State = #extra_state{blksize = BlkSize, peer = Peer},
  244:     extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, State),
  245:     {ok, SuggestedOptions, State};
  246: extra_prepare(_Peer, _Access, _Bin, _Mode, _SuggestedOptions, _Initial) ->
  247:     {error, {undef, "Illegal callback options."}}.
  248: 
  249: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  250: %% Open
  251: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  252: 
  253: extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) ->
  254:     %% Server side
  255:     case extra_prepare(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) of
  256:         {ok, AcceptedOptions, []} ->
  257:             BlkSize = list_to_integer(tftp_test_lib:lookup_option("blksize", "512", AcceptedOptions)),
  258:             State = #extra_state{blksize = BlkSize, peer = Peer},
  259:             extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, AcceptedOptions, State);
  260:         {error, {Code, Text}} ->
  261:             {error, {Code, Text}}
  262:     end;
  263: extra_open(_Peer, Access, LocalFilename, _Mode, NegotiatedOptions, #extra_state{} = State) ->
  264:     {File, Acc} =
  265:         case Access of
  266:             read ->
  267:                 if
  268:                     is_binary(LocalFilename) ->
  269:                         {undefined, LocalFilename};
  270:                     is_list(LocalFilename) ->
  271:                         {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(LocalFilename),
  272:                         {LocalFilename, Bin}
  273:             end;
  274:             write -> 
  275:                 {LocalFilename, []}
  276:         end,
  277:     %% Both sides
  278:     State2 = State#extra_state{file = File, acc = Acc, count = 0},
  279:     {ok, NegotiatedOptions, State2}.
  280: 
  281: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  282: %% Read
  283: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  284: 
  285: extra_read(#extra_state{acc = Bin} = State) when is_binary(Bin) ->
  286:     BlkSize = State#extra_state.blksize,
  287:     Count = State#extra_state.count + size(Bin),
  288:     if
  289:         size(Bin) >= BlkSize ->
  290:             <<Block:BlkSize/binary, Bin2/binary>> = Bin,
  291:             State2 = State#extra_state{acc = Bin2, count = Count},
  292:             {more, Block, State2};
  293:         size(Bin) < BlkSize ->
  294:             Res = [{count, Count}, State#extra_state.peer],
  295:             {last, Bin, Res}
  296:     end.
  297: 
  298: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  299: %% Write
  300: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  301: 
  302: extra_write(Bin, #extra_state{acc = List} = State) when is_binary(Bin), is_list(List) ->
  303:     Size = size(Bin),
  304:     BlkSize = State#extra_state.blksize,
  305:     if
  306:         Size == BlkSize ->
  307:             {more, State#extra_state{acc = [Bin | List]}};
  308:         Size < BlkSize ->
  309:             Bin2 = list_to_binary(lists:reverse([Bin | List])),
  310:             Res = [{bin,  Bin2}, State#extra_state.peer],
  311:             file:write_file(State#extra_state.file, Bin2),
  312:             {last, Res}
  313:     end.
  314: 
  315: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  316: %% Abort
  317: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  318: 
  319: extra_abort(_Code, _Text, #extra_state{}) ->
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  323: %% Re-send client
  324: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  325: 
  326: resend_client(doc) ->
  327:     ["Verify that the server behaves correctly when the client re-sends packets."];
  328: resend_client(suite) ->
  329:     [];
  330: resend_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  331:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  332:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, all}])),
  333: 
  334:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 10)),
  335:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 512)),
  336:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 1025)),
  337: 
  338:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 10)),
  339:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 512)),
  340:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 1025)),
  341:     
  342:     %% Cleanup
  343:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  344:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  345:     ok.
  346: 
  347: resend_read_client(Host, Port, BlkSize) ->
  348:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_read_client.tmp",
  349:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  350:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  351:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  352:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  353:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  354:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5],
  355:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  356:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob)),
  357: 
  358:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  359:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  360: 
  361:     %% Open socket
  362:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  363: 
  364:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  365:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  366:     NewPort =
  367:         if
  368:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  369:                 %% Send READ
  370:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary(ReadList),
  371:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  372: 
  373:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  374:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  375: 
  376:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  377:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  378:                 NewPort0;
  379:             true ->
  380:                 %% Send READ
  381:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  382:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  383:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  384:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  385: 
  386:                 %% Recv OACK
  387:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6 | Options]),
  388:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  389: 
  390:                 %% Send ACK #0
  391:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  392:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  393: 
  394:                 %% Send ACK #0 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  395:                 timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  396:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  397: 
  398:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  399:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  400:                 NewPort0
  401:         end,
  402: 
  403:     %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  404:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  405: 
  406:     %% Send ACK #1
  407:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  408:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin)),
  409: 
  410:     %% Recv DATA #2
  411:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  412:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  413: 
  414:     %% Send ACK #2
  415:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  416:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  417: 
  418:     %% Recv DATA #3
  419:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  420:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  421: 
  422:     %% Send ACK #3
  423:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  424:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin)),
  425: 
  426:     %% Send ACK #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  427:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  428:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin)),
  429: 
  430:     %% Recv DATA #4 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  431:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  432:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  433: 
  434:     %% Recv DATA #4 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  435:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  436: 
  437:     %% Send ACK #2 which is out of range
  438:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  439: 
  440:     %% Send ACK #4
  441:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  442:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack4Bin)),
  443: 
  444:     %% Recv DATA #5
  445:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  446:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  447: 
  448:     %% Send ACK #5
  449:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  450:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack5Bin)),
  451: 
  452:     %% Close socket
  453:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  454: 
  455:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  456:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  457:     ok.
  458: 
  459: resend_write_client(Host, Port, BlkSize) ->
  460:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_write_client.tmp",
  461:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  462:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  463:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  464:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  465:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  466:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5],
  467:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  468:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  469:     ?VERIFY({error, enoent}, file:read_file(RemoteFilename)),
  470: 
  471:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  472:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  473: 
  474:     %% Open socket
  475:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  476: 
  477:     WriteList = [0, 2, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  478:     NewPort =
  479:         if
  480:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  481:                 %% Send WRITE
  482:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary(WriteList),
  483:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, WriteBin)),
  484: 
  485:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  486:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  487: 
  488:                 %% Recv ACK #0 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  489:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  490:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  491: 
  492:                 %% Recv ACK #0  AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  493:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  494:                 NewPort0;
  495:             true ->
  496:                 %% Send WRITE
  497:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  498:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary([WriteList, "blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  499:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, WriteBin)),
  500: 
  501:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  502:                 timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  503: 
  504:                 %% Recv OACK (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  505:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  506:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  507:                 
  508:                 %% Recv OACK AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  509:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  510:                 NewPort0
  511:         end,
  512: 
  513:     %% Send DATA #1
  514:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  515:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin)),
  516: 
  517:     %% Recv ACK #1 
  518:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  519:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  520: 
  521:     %% Send DATA #2
  522:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  523:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin)),
  524: 
  525:     %% Recv ACK #2
  526:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  527:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  528: 
  529:     %% Send DATA #3
  530:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  531:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin)),
  532: 
  533:     %% Recv ACK #3
  534:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  535:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  536: 
  537:     %% Send DATA #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  538:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  539:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin)),
  540: 
  541:     %% Recv ACK #3 AGAIN (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  542:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  543: 
  544:     %% Send DATA #2 which is out of range
  545:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin)),
  546: 
  547:     %% Send DATA #4
  548:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  549:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin)),
  550: 
  551:     %% Recv ACK #4
  552:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  553:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  554: 
  555:     %% Send DATA #5
  556:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  557:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data5Bin)),
  558: 
  559:     %% Recv ACK #5
  560:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  561:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  562: 
  563:     %% Close socket
  564:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  565: 
  566:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  567:     ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, file:read_file(RemoteFilename)),
  568:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  569:     ok.
  570: 
  571: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  572: %% Re-send server
  573: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  574: 
  575: resend_server(doc) ->
  576:     ["Verify that the server behaves correctly when the server re-sends packets."];
  577: resend_server(suite) ->
  578:     [];
  579: resend_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  580:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  581: 
  582:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 10)),
  583:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 512)),
  584:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 1025)),
  585:     
  586:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 10)),
  587:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 512)),
  588:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 1025)),
  589:     ok.
  590: 
  591: resend_read_server(Host, BlkSize) ->
  592:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_read_server.tmp",
  593:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  594:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  595:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  596:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  597:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  598:     Block6 = [],
  599:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5, Block6],
  600:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  601: 
  602:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  603:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  604: 
  605:     %% Open daemon socket
  606:     {ok, DaemonSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  607:     {ok, DaemonPort} = ?IGNORE(inet:port(DaemonSocket)),
  608: 
  609:     %% Open server socket
  610:     {ok, ServerSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  611:     ?IGNORE(inet:port(ServerSocket)),
  612: 
  613:     %% Prepare client process
  614:     ReplyTo = self(),
  615:     ClientFun =
  616:         fun(Extra) ->
  617:                 Options = [{port, DaemonPort}, {debug, brief}] ++ Extra,
  618:                 Res = ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, Options)),
  619:                 ReplyTo ! {self(), {tftp_client_reply, Res}},
  620:                 exit(normal)
  621:         end,
  622: 
  623:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  624:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  625:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  626:     {ClientPort, ClientPid} =
  627:         if
  628:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  629:                 %% Start client process
  630:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([]) end),
  631: 
  632:                 %% Recv READ
  633:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary(ReadList),
  634:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, ReadBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  635: 
  636:                 %% Send DATA #1
  637:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin)),
  638: 
  639:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  640:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  641: 
  642:                 %% Recv ACK #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  643:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  644: 
  645:                 %% Recv ACK #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  646:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  647:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0};
  648:             true ->
  649:                 %% Start client process
  650:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  651:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([{"blksize", BlkSizeList}]) end),
  652:                 
  653:                 %% Recv READ
  654:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  655:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  656:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, ReadBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  657: 
  658:                 %% Send OACK
  659:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  660:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  661:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, OptionAckBin)),
  662: 
  663:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  664:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  665: 
  666:                 %% Recv ACK #0 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  667:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  668:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  669: 
  670:                 %% Recv ACK #0 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  671:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  672: 
  673:                 %% Send DATA #1
  674:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin)),
  675: 
  676:                 %% Recv ACK #1
  677:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  678:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0}
  679:         end,
  680: 
  681:     %% Send DATA #2
  682:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  683:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data2Bin)),
  684: 
  685:     %% Recv ACK #2
  686:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  687:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  688: 
  689:     %% Send DATA #3
  690:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  691:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  692: 
  693:     %% Recv ACK #3
  694:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  695:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  696: 
  697:     %% Send DATA #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  698:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  699:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  700: 
  701:     %% Recv ACK #3 AGAIN (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  702:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  703: 
  704:     %% Send DATA #4
  705:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  706:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin)),
  707: 
  708:     %% Recv ACK #4
  709:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  710:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  711: 
  712:     %% Send DATA #3 which is out of range
  713:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  714: 
  715:     %% Send DATA #5
  716:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  717:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data5Bin)),
  718: 
  719:     %% Recv ACK #5
  720:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  721:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  722: 
  723:     %% Send DATA #6
  724:     Data6Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 6 | Block6]),
  725:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data6Bin)),
  726: 
  727:     %% Close daemon and server sockets
  728:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(ServerSocket)),
  729:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(DaemonSocket)),
  730: 
  731:     ?VERIFY({ClientPid, {tftp_client_reply, {ok, Blob}}}, recv(Timeout)),
  732: 
  733:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  734:     ok.
  735: 
  736: resend_write_server(Host, BlkSize) ->
  737:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_write_server.tmp",
  738:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  739:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  740:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  741:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  742:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  743:     Block6 = [],
  744:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5, Block6],
  745:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  746:     Size = size(Blob),
  747: 
  748:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  749:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  750: 
  751:     %% Open daemon socket
  752:     {ok, DaemonSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  753:     {ok, DaemonPort} = ?IGNORE(inet:port(DaemonSocket)),
  754: 
  755:     %% Open server socket
  756:     {ok, ServerSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  757:     ?IGNORE(inet:port(ServerSocket)),
  758: 
  759:     %% Prepare client process
  760:     ReplyTo = self(),
  761:     ClientFun =
  762:         fun(Extra) ->
  763:                 Options = [{port, DaemonPort}, {debug, brief}] ++ Extra,
  764:                 Res = ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob, Options)),
  765:                 ReplyTo ! {self(), {tftp_client_reply, Res}},
  766:                 exit(normal)
  767:         end,
  768: 
  769:     WriteList = [0, 2, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  770:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  771:     {ClientPort, ClientPid} =
  772:         if
  773:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  774:                 %% Start client process
  775:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([]) end),
  776: 
  777:                 %% Recv WRITE
  778:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary(WriteList),
  779:                 io:format("WriteBin ~p\n", [WriteBin]),
  780:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, WriteBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  781: 
  782:                 %% Send ACK #1
  783:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  784:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  785: 
  786:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  787:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  788: 
  789:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  790:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  791: 
  792:                 %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  793:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  794:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0};
  795:             true ->
  796:                 %% Start client process
  797:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  798:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([{"blksize", BlkSizeList}]) end),
  799:                 
  800:                 %% Recv WRITE
  801:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  802:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary([WriteList | Options]),
  803:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, WriteBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  804: 
  805:                 %% Send OACK
  806:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  807:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  808:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, OptionAckBin)),
  809: 
  810:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  811:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  812: 
  813:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  814:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  815: 
  816:                 %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  817:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  818:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0}
  819:         end,
  820: 
  821:     %% Send ACK #1
  822:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  823:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack1Bin)),
  824: 
  825:     %% Recv DATA #2
  826:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  827:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  828: 
  829:     %% Send ACK #2
  830:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  831:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack2Bin)),
  832: 
  833:     %% Recv DATA #3
  834:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  835:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  836: 
  837:     %% Send ACK #3
  838:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  839:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  840: 
  841:     %% Send ACK #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  842:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  843:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  844: 
  845:     %% Recv DATA #4 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  846:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  847:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  848: 
  849:     %% Recv DATA #4 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  850:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  851: 
  852:     %% Send ACK #4
  853:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  854:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack4Bin)),
  855: 
  856:     %% Recv DATA #5
  857:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  858:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  859: 
  860:     %% Send ACK #3 which is out of range
  861:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  862: 
  863:     %% Send ACK #5
  864:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  865:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack5Bin)),
  866: 
  867:     %% Recv DATA #6
  868:     Data6Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 6 | Block6]),
  869:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data6Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  870: 
  871:     %% Send ACK #6
  872:     Ack6Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 6>>,
  873:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack6Bin)),
  874: 
  875:     %% Close daemon and server sockets
  876:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(ServerSocket)),
  877:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(DaemonSocket)),
  878: 
  879:     ?VERIFY({ClientPid, {tftp_client_reply, {ok, Size}}}, recv(Timeout)),
  880: 
  881:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  882:     ok.
  883: 
  884: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  885: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  886: 
  887: reuse_connection(doc) ->
  888:     ["Verify that the server can reuse an ongiong connection when same client resends request."];
  889: reuse_connection(suite) ->
  890:     [];
  891: reuse_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  892:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  893:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, all}])),
  894: 
  895:     RemoteFilename = "reuse_connection.tmp",
  896:     BlkSize = 512,
  897:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  898:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize div 2, $2),
  899:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2],
  900:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  901:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob)),
  902:     
  903:     Seconds = 3,
  904:     Timeout = timer:seconds(Seconds),
  905:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  906:     
  907:     %% Open socket
  908:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  909:     
  910:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  911:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  912:     
  913:     %% Send READ
  914:     TimeoutList = integer_to_list(Seconds),
  915:     Options = ["timeout", 0, TimeoutList, 0],
  916:     ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  917:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  918: 
  919:     %% Send yet another READ for same file
  920:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  921: 
  922:     %% Recv OACK
  923:     OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6 | Options]),
  924:     {udp, _, _, NewPort, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  925: 
  926:     %% Send ACK #0
  927:     Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  928:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack0Bin)),
  929: 
  930:     %% Recv DATA #1
  931:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  932: 
  933:     %% Send ACK #1
  934:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  935:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin)),
  936: 
  937:     %% Recv DATA #2
  938:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  939:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  940: 
  941:     %% Send ACK #2
  942:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  943:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  944: 
  945:     %% Close socket
  946:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  947: 
  948:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  949:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  950: 
  951:     %% Cleanup
  952:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  953:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  954:     ok.
  955: 
  956: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  957: %% Large file: transfer > 65535 blocks
  958: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  959: 
  960: large_file(doc) ->
  961:     ["Start the daemon and test transfer of files greater than 32M."];
  962: large_file(suite) ->
  963:     [];
  964: large_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  965:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(tftp)),
  966: 
  967:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  968: 
  969:     %% Read fail
  970:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_temporary_large_file_remote_test_file.txt",
  971:     LocalFilename = "tftp_temporary_large_file_local_test_file.txt",
  972: 
  973:     {ok, FH} = file:open(LocalFilename, [write,exclusive]),
  974:     {ok, Size} = file:position(FH, {eof, 2*512*65535}),
  975:     ok = file:truncate(FH),
  976:     ?IGNORE(file:close(FH)),
  977: 
  978:     %% Write and read
  979:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  980:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  981:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  982: 
  983:     %% Cleanup
  984:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  985:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  986:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  987:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  988:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(tftp)),
  989:     ok.
  990: 
  991: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  992: %% Goodies
  993: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  994: 
  995: recv(Timeout) ->
  996:     receive
  997:         Msg ->
  998:             Msg
  999:     after Timeout ->
 1000:             timeout
 1001:     end.
